name: Wild_LIFE (Logic, Inheritance, Functions, Equations)
description: Wild_LIFE is an interpreter for the LIFE programming language (Logic, Inheritance, Functions, Equations), developed at the DEC Paris Research Laboratory in the early 1990s. LIFE is a constraint logic programming language that integrates functional programming, inheritance, and equational theories.
releaseNotes: Final release archived in the CMU AI Repository (1994-03-24). Earlier versions 0.90 and 0.91 are also preserved.
